forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle. Partly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. North wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Patchy Fog
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 8pm, then patchy fog. Partly cloudy. Low around 51, with temperatures rising to around 53 overnight. East wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
